description: Kouga arrives to the Palaestra, guided by Bear Geki and his disciple Souma. There he is greeted by Saint apprentices, who first approach him with hostility. Also, Kouga meets Aquila Yuna, the young female Saint, who teaches him about his constellation and about the code that guides Saint women.

titles.title: Kamen no Okite! Kaze no Saint Arawaru!
La loi du masque. Le chevalier qui maîtrisait le vent !
Law of the Mask! The Saint of the Wind Appears!
仮面の掟! 風の聖闘士[セイント]現わる!
